title: HP Spectre x360 13.5 (2022) vs HP Envy x360 13 (2022): Comparing HPâ€™s new premium laptops
content:
HP recently introduced refreshed versions of most of its premium laptops. Of course, that includes the top-of-the-line HP Spectre x360 family, but HP also introduced the new Envy family, which is a slightly more mainstream, but still premium series of laptops and convertibles. These laptops have a lot in common, but they do have different

The post HP Spectre x360 13.5 (2022) vs HP Envy x360 13 (2022): Comparing HP’s new premium laptops appeared first on XDA.
description: HP's Spectre x360 13.5 and Envy x360 13.3 are two great premium convertibles, but which one is best for you? Let's compare them.
